lines: 1. Roho mar Nyasaye, ibina,Luok chunya obed maler;Bende parona ipwodhi,Bi, ipong` chunya koro.
Much Nyasaye, mond` ibi,Pong` chunya, asayoi;Pwodha abed ng`ati chutho,Much Nyasaye,ibi koro.
2. Roho mar Nyasaye, bi kuoma;Kata ok anyal neniTo adwaro mond` ibina,Bi, ipong` chunya koro.
3. An ayom, aonge teko,An akulorani, Ruoth;Roho mar Nyasaye maler,to Mond` imiya tekoni.
4. Luoka, hoya, thiedha, gwedha;Herani opong`chunya;Konya, sira, taya pile;Gwethni mond` osik koda.
